output:
**Income Tax Query Response:**

I understand you're asking about income tax: "Income tax slabs for FY 2024-25"

For income tax queries, visit the official e-filing portal at incometax.gov.in. ITR filing deadline is typically July 31st for individuals.

**Helpful Resources:**
• GST Portal: https://www.gst.gov.in/
• Income Tax Portal: https://www.incometax.gov.in/
• MCA Portal: https://www.mca.gov.in/

**InvoNest Features:**
• Professional invoice templates
• GST-compliant formats
• Payment tracking
• Tax calculations

Feel free to ask more specific questions - I'll do my best to help!
